content.question: Cum hoc minor frater eodem lecto quiescebat (lines 2-3) is translated

choices.label: When his brother was sleeping on a bed beneath his
When this younger brother was sleeping on a certain bed
His younger brother was sleeping on the same bed with this man
His brother, although younger than this man, was sleeping on the same bed

content.answer: His younger brother was sleeping on the same bed with this man

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
